thread.title: Obama defends Black Lives Matter movement
thread.title_full: Obama defends Black Lives Matter movement

title: Obama defends Black Lives Matter movement
text:
> Political Obama defends Black Lives Matter movement President Barack Obama listens to remarks from panelist during a forum on criminal justice reform, Thursday, Oct. 22, 2015, in the Old Executive Office Building on the White House complex in Washington.
